title: Unravelling the last-mile conundrum: A comparative study of autonomous delivery robots, delivery bicycles, and light commercial vehicles in 14 varied European landscapes
content:
Publication date: 1 August 2024

Source: Sustainable Cities and Society, Volume 108

Author(s): Ada Garus, Panayotis Christidis, Andromachi Mourtzouchou, Louison Duboz, Biagio Ciuffo
